Name: Roman de Franco
Subtitle: Double agent
Description: The first time your opponent reveals an asset each turn, he or she reveals it from your asset deck.

Name: Miles Garett
Subtitle: Salesman
Description: After you acquire an asset, draw a card.

Name: Linus Järvinen
Subtitle: Traitor
Description: When attempting to acquire assets from your opponent's deck, your strength, speed, and charm are increased by one

Name: Body Double
Subtitle: Cannon Fodder
Description: Trash: prevent any one instance where you would discard cards from hand, or prevent an ally from being discarded.

Name: Sgt. Collins
Subtitle: Drill Sergeant
Description: Pay $1 to gain 1 strength (limit 3x per turn).

Name: Adriaan De Vries
Subtitle: Mercenary
Description: Pay $X: defeat 1 enemy, where X is the enemy's cost (limit once per turn)

Name: Steve Sanders
Subtitle: Movie Star
Description: Reduces the charm requirement of Civilian and Government assets by 1.

Name: Sally Harlow
Subtitle: Intelligence Analyst
Description: Discard one intel to gain $2 (limit 2x per turn).

Name: Sergei Tchaikovsky
Subtitle: General
Description: Gain $1 whenever you defeat an enemy (limit 2x per turn).

Name: Josef Minsky
Subtitle: New Recruit.
Description: Trash: defeat the enemy currently being encountered, if it's cost is $4 or less.

Name: Alexandra Sokolov
Subtitle: True Believer
Description: Trash: evade the enemy currently being encountered.

Name: Petr Trotsky
Subtitle: Party Official
Description: Trash: Gain 4 charm for use acquiring the current asset.

Name: Anastasiya Popov
Subtitle: Helicopter Pilot
Description: Pay $1 to gain 1 evade (limit 3x per turn).

Name: Linda Koenig
Subtitle: Student Activist
Description: Reduces the charm requirement of Civilian assets by 2.

Name: ‘Sarah Jensen’
Subtitle: Pretend American
Description: Trash: (encounter phase only) acquire one Civilian asset with 3 intel or less.

Name: Christopher Brown
Subtitle: Mad Scientist
Description: Reduces the cost of the first Equipment card you play each turn by one.

Name: Sarah Moretti
Subtitle: Head of Recruitment
Description: Pay $1 to gain 1 charm (limit 3x per turn).

Name: Dr. Jax
Subtitle: Cybernetics Specialist
Description: Exhaust Dr. Jax to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Trap or Robot enemy.

Subtitle: The Nine
Description: Discard a random card from your hand to raise a stat by 1 (limit 2x per turn).

Subtitle: The Nine
Description: When played: look at the top ten cards of your play deck and arrange them in any order.

Subtitle: The Nine
Description: When drawing cards in the Upkeep phase, draw one extra, then return one card from your hand to the bottom of the deck.

Name: Frederich Schneider
Subtitle: Enforcer
Description: Pay $1 to increase the charm requirement of an asset by 1 (limit 3x per turn).

Name: Jackson Richards
Subtitle: Strategist
Description: At the end of the encounter phase, if you did not acquire an asset, gain $1 and draw one card.
